title: (x) The Rohm and Haas Paint Quality Institute - ITC Garamond, custom cap {Dan}
content:
I’m not sure if the Q is the logo was a font or hand drawn, but can anyone come close or know of a similar water type font? Perferably freeware but other a welcome.

[http://www.paintquality.com/images/logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125214417/http:/www.paintquality.com/images/logo.gif)
author: elabdesigns

comments.content: The Q is a custom illustration, I’ll guess the text is ITC Garamond Bold

I think Dan is right, and I also think the drops are add-ons.

For a free ‘watery’ font, you might consider Chank’s [Saltwater](http://web.archive.org/web/20051125214417/http:/www.dafont.com/en/font.php?file=saltwater)

- Mike Yanega
